title: Could you help me to discover the name of this types?
content:
Hi! I would like to know the name of this types could you help me?  
Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014103548im_/http:/typophile.com/files/img048_4223.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014103548im_/http:/typophile.com/files/img045_4779.jpg)

 [‹ ID Typeface from Goddard film, 'Weekend', please?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014103548/http:/typophile.com/node/46578 "Go to previous forum topic") [Black (Death) Metal typography ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014103548/http:/typophile.com/node/36731 "Go to next forum topic")
author: PLYA

comments.content:
Maybe “AND EDITORIAL..” would be avant garde?

And the “AMERICA IN..” Do you know which is its name?

THANKS

AN EDITORIAL looks like possibly Trade Gothic Condensed. Certainly not Avant Garde.

Whales Weep is similar to Clarendon but not an exact match.
